name: Wood Blocks Puzzle
description:
Wood Block Puzzle is a simple and exciting block match puzzle game - simply drag the bone blocks and try to fill all the grids. This brain teaser is suitable for all ages.

Game RULES

• Drag the puzzle blocks to move them.
• Aim to fit them all into the frame.
• Touch puzzle blocks to remove them from the field.
• Blocks can't be rotated.

Thank you for playing!
